title: Product Designer, Video Apps
summary: The people here at Apple don’t just create products — they create the kind of wonder that’s revolutionized entire industries...
description: From brainstorming through implementation, you will work with members of Apple’s Pro Video Apps, as well as our engineering, marketing, and QA groups...
preferred_qualifications: Proven product design experience delivery solutions for productivity and/or collaboration-focused apps...
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role...
